summary.span: 命名空間提供以行動為基礎的程式撰寫模型，這個模型支援廣泛資料流程及管線工作的同處理序訊息傳遞。

span.span: The namespace provides an actor-based programming model that supports in-process message passing for coarse-grained dataflow and pipelining tasks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [tpl-install-instructions](~/includes/tpl-install-instructions.md)] 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料流程](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/dataflow-task-parallel-library.md)。For more information, see [Dataflow](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/dataflow-task-parallel-library.md).
